name: Destroy Air Funnel
description: Technique to create a cannon for small projectiles.

name: Destroy Air Scooter
description: A form of transportation invented by Aang.

name: Destroy Airbender Staff
description: A wooden stave used primarily by airbenders to augment their bending.

name: Airbender Upgraded Staff
description: Upgraded staff made by Mechanist for Aang at the Fire Nation Invasion.

name: Asphyxiation
description: Manipulates the flow of air within a person's respiratory system and prevents any new intake of breath by forming a ball of air around the head.

name: Glider
description: Aerial transportation made by Mechanist, inspired from Air nomad gliders.

name: Hot Air Balloon
description: Air balloon created by Mechanist, originally developed for the Fire Nation

name: Crystal Armor
description: Armor made of crystal that makes the person cannot move.

name: Earth Sink
description: Make the person sink to the ground.

name: Rock Gloves
description: Favored weapons of Ba Sing Se's secret police force, known as the Dai Li.

name: Slinky Tank
description: Stone vehicles provided both transportation and protection during the invasion of the Fire Nation.

name: Surface Rocks
description: Largse rocks used as projectiles of Royal Earthbender Guards.

name: Blue Fire
description: Bend completely blue flames, which are hotter than the orange flames.

name: Combustionbending
description: Ignite objects with their mind instead of traditional firebending methods.
